message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I see in this product, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this price point reflects its true worth.
I understand that you see a lot of value in the product, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle again?
Bob, I'm seeing a pattern here and I need you to be serious about this. $16,500 is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I'm still interested in the product, but $16,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $14,500. Can we finally come to an agreement?
